scripts.build: npm run clonePublic && npm run genIcons && cross-env NODE_ENV=production postcss public/tailwind.css -o bundled/global.css && webpack --config webpack.build.config.js
scripts.dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development concurrently "npm run genRoute"    "postcss public/tailwind.css -o public/global.css --watch" "webpack-dev-server --hot --allowed-hosts .jmart.cloud --content-base public --host 0.0.0.0 --port 9090 --sockPath /socket "
scripts.local: cross-env NODE_ENV=development concurrently "npm run genRoute"   "postcss public/tailwind.css -o public/global.css --watch" "webpack-dev-server --hot --content-base public  --config webpack.local.config.js "
